content.text: Constancians were short, telepathic mammalian humanoids indigenous to Constancia.
The Constancians were telepathic humanoids with flaming orange-colored skin, orange hair, and yellowish-gold eyes. They had child-like features.
The Constancians evolved on the Deep Core planet of Constancia. The area around their homeworld was explored sometime between 1000 BBY and 25 BBY.
Gamine and Sharlee were both Constancians.

elements.text: "ComicScan: Coming Full Circle"—Star Wars Galaxy Collector 3
"The University of Sanbra Guide to Intelligent Life: The Marvel Series"—Star Wars Gamer 1
